title: Conversation with Joel & Victoria: Peaceful on Purpose Part 2
itunes:title: Conversation with Joel & Victoria: Peaceful on Purpose Part 2
description:
Peaceful on Purpose, the new book from Joel Osteen, shows you how to shift from worry and stress to rest and trust in Almighty God. When you’re peaceful on purpose, you know God is always working on your behalf. He can turn any situation around for your good!

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
